tn.text: The word "now" is used here to mark the change from the lists of descendants to background information about Reuben. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:writing_background]])

tn.ref: but his birthright was given to the sons of Joseph son of Israel
tn.text: "but Israel gave Reuben's birthright to the sons of Joseph, another of Israel's sons" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])

tn.ref: Reuben had defiled his father's couch
tn.text: This is a polite way to speak about Reuben sleeping with father's secondary wife. The couch is the place where a man and his wife would have slept together. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_euphemism]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_metonymy]])

tn.ref: So he is not recorded as being the oldest
tn.text: "So the family history does not list Reuben as the oldest son" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])
